In Istanbul, soaring rents put the middle class under pressure
description: The cost of housing has spiraled out of control in the Turkish capital, driven by hyperinflation and the collapse of the national currency.

headline: August heat wave deemed a 'rare event' by Météo-France
description: The recent heat wave ranks among the most severe ever experienced in the south of France, rivaling the historic August 2003 event, according to the French weather forecasting adminstration. It was also the second-longest recorded in August.

headline: The giraffe is no longer one single species, but four distinct ones, including one that is critically endangered
description: Based on genetic, morphological and biogeographical data, the International Union for Conservation of Nature announces a major change in classification.

headline: The books we accumulate but will never read are 'less a burden than a form of wealth'
description: 'Letters from America' (5/6). Writer and journalist Thomas Chatterton Williams sees beauty in accumulating thousands of books in his library, knowing that a single lifetime would never be enough to read them all – a beauty found in an unexplored world.

description: At her Russian-controlled high school near Luhansk, a pro-Ukrainian teenager who resisted propaganda was the target of relentless disciplinary action since January. Fearing that she could be placed in foster care or even adopted, her mother decided to flee the occupied territory.

headline: AI, my students and me: 'Last semester marks the nadir of my experience in academia'
description: 'Letters from America' (1/6). The writer and journalist Thomas Chatterton Williams has been startled by the omnipresence of artificial intelligence at university, which he believes threatens the very foundations of education and our ability to think.

headline: What is Kick, the platform on which a French streamer died live?
description: Raphaël Grave, known online as Jean Pormanove, died Monday during a livestream. The tragedy has shed light on a little-known streaming site and its extremely permissive moderation policies.
